Think i miss a method??? can somebody help me with this

EDIT: Checked it out in client class and i was right missing the Closeall() method can somebody give yours?

item.title: [317/Delta] Adding Quests with kill requirements and more *BIG*
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

@Spy

I’m not sure where the 7 came from, since it has been a while since I typed this up. But it works, I’m sure of that.
As for the 12, you didn’t read through the entire tut.
I said earlier that we would use the Dialogue #12 for the quest reward, and later I gave the code for that:

if (NpcDialogue == 12){ // XP first, so the quest screen doesn't get f*cked up addSkillXP(500, playerAttack); // Pretty obvious, adds 500 exp into attack strength and defence addSkillXP(500, playerStrength); addSkillXP(500, playerDefence); clearQuestInterface(); // Send a clean Quest Interface sendQuest("You have recieved:", 4911); // Second line of the quest interface sendQuest("You have completed *questnamehere*!", 4913); // Title sendQuest("Some steel items", 4914); // Line after "You have recieved" sendQuest("500 XP in Attack, Strength and Defence", 4915); // Next line sendQuest("2,500 Gold Pieces", 4916); // Next line showInterface(4909); // Send completed quest picture addItem(995,2500); // Gives 2500 GP addItem(1119, 1); // Gives a steel scimitar addItem(1069, 1); // Gives a steel platebody addItem(1193, 1); // Steel platelegs addItem(1325, 1); // Steel kite }

Edit:
Meh, Copy/paste messed up the indentation.

Read full topic

item.title: [317/Delta] Adding Quests with kill requirements and more *BIG*
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

Ok,there is a problem when I was doing this,
you see this code?

NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 7 || NpcDialogue == 8 || NpcDialogue == 11

How did the 7 came when there is only 4,5,6,8,9,10,11 Dialgue?
If you want to chek,then go up and look for you’rself,there is NO 7…

And onther one,the Dialgue 12 in here

else if (NpcDialogue == 10 || NpcDialogue == 12) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; RemoveAllWindows(); }
From where you got the 12?? there is no 12 in the Dialogue you gave us…

Read full topic
item.source: [317/Delta] Adding Quests with kill requirements and more *BIG*

item.title: [317/Delta] Adding Quests with kill requirements and more *BIG*
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Death Owner Death
item.description:
@Owner_Death wrote:

I made my quest and everything works except that the dialogue goes to the “you killed 10 goblins here’s your reward text” (i made mine have to kill 10 goblins) right after I click on the “Yes” to accept the quest.

I fixed my problem. For anyone with the same problem just input

closeAll();

into the case that your dialogue is right before the quest reward.

TY for this great TUT

Read full topic

client.java:11853: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ client.java:11898: illegal start of type try { ^ client.java:11898: ';' expected try { ^ client.java:11899: <identifier> expected characterfile.close(); ^ client.java:11900: class, interface, or enum expected } catch (IOException ioexception) { ^ client.java:11903: class, interface, or enum expected return 13; ^ client.java:11904: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:11906: class, interface, or enum expected public void loadpm(long name, int world) { ^ client.java:11909: class, interface, or enum expected } else if (world == 0) { ^ client.java:11911: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:11913: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeQWord(name);
